"The relay project.

"
"In the last two decades the Internet has become an essential means of communication between" "people and communities around the world. The Internet helps us to connect with each other," "to share knowledge and thereby facilitates the improvement and innovation of education," "health and economy. Despite the exponentially growing rate of internet penetration more " "than 50 per cent[1] of the world population still doesn’t have access to the Internet.

"
"One of the main obstacles to internet access is poverty, most of the world’s developing" "countries cannot afford to build the Internet infrastructure. Wireless Internet solutions" "without proper infrastructure are expensive. This creates a reality in which people living " "in rural areas of the developing world, who already have limited resources, also have no" "access to the Internet.

"
"The primary objective of this project is to provide a simple and low cost solution for this" "complex problem by creating an application that provides network infrastructure via mobile" "devices to users who live in remote locations where there is limited or no access to the" "internet.
